page.title: 15Horses at Evesbatch Court
page.content: Mrs. Sinclair owns 5 horses and she trains 3 clients' horses. The main {horse sport}is long distance. This is a very tiring sport, requiring stamina of both riders and horses. Mrs. Sinclair mainly does hunting, but the clients do the long distance. The long distance is mainly{25 miles {to 100 miles.} The{veterinary {inspections}are very strict and the horse has to be very fit. The speed the horse goes at is{7 mph,}human jogging speed. They have to do the set amount of distance in one day and if the horse comes back with any blemishes points are deducted. If their heart beat is more than a normal 60/minute or their respiration more than 6 breaths/minute, the horse is disqualified.
